name: Sex Adventures - GangBang Surprise
description:
About the game
An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a famous young divorcee surprised by one of her ex-boyfriends with an unexpected gang bang.
Visual Novel Description
You know what’s harder than being the wife of a rock star?
Being his recently divorced one…especially when you have a sexual appetite worthy of the front pages of the dirtiest scandal magazines in the world.
Lily DeLuna found out how hard it is to be in the spotlight, when she went public with her decision of ending things with the Rock Legend, after he was seen entertaining the groupies all over the world. All while she was kept at home with nothing but a plastic phallus to entertain her.
As expected, the paparazzi went crazy at the news. Going as far as to follow her in all her favorite places pretending to be random guys hitting on her in hopes to get some dirty details about the settlement with her famous husband.
Little did they know she was willing to offer something even dirtier with that pretty mouth if only they could keep the silence about the whole thing and give her what she so desperately needs – some wild nights full of passion.
After an entire year of laying low and staying away from men out of fear of picking up the wrong one, Lily surprised her ex lover Mike with an unexpected invite to her new place. Lucky to her, Mike accepted the invitation, but couldn’t refrain from upping the stakes with a surprise of his own.
…
Will Lily be deterred by Mike’s boldness, or will she welcome it with an open mind?
Follow the story and find out…
Features
- HD renders
- Animations
